      • substituteImages

        public static java.lang.String substituteImages(java.lang.String input,
                                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> imageMap)
        Input is email template with image tags: <img src="${image:com.centurylink.mdw.base/mdw.png}" alt="MDW"> Uses the unqualified image name as its CID. Populates imageMap with results.
